Marie, ON, CAN STARS' STATS: Quote: http://stars.nhl.com/club/stats.htm FLYERS-STARS' SERIES HISTORY: Current and Miscellaneous The Flyers' regular season W-L-T-OTL record against the Minnesota North Stars/Dallas Stars is 68-38-32-0. The Flyers' regular season W-L-T-OTL record at home is 44-10-16-0 and 24-28-16-0 away. The Flyers are 6-7-9-0 against the Dallas Stars including 4-2-6-0 at home and 2-5-3-0 away. The Flyers went 62-31-23-0 against the Minnesota North Stars including 40-8-10-0 at home and 22-23-13-0 away. The last regular season shutout in Philly was March 22, 1975. There have been 17 regular season shutouts, nine in Philly and eight at the Stars. The Flyers
